pageContext.claim: “When you look at Bruce Ohr, whose wife was getting paid by people that did a totally phony deal. And they got a tremendous amount of money, the money. I mean the millions of dollars.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump attacks a career Justice Department official, who had contacts with British agent Christopher Steele and Glenn Simpson of Fusion GPS, which was hired by the Democrats to investigate Trump's ties in Russia. He suggests that this makes the process "rigged" when in fact Ohr was not involved in the Russian investigation and it's unclear what role he might have played. Ohr's wife did assist in assembling the dossier. They did not make millions of dollars.
